name: UntitledGameDemo
description:
My second game to improve my coding. Took about 20 - 30 days ( Coding + making sprites on Aseprit, and learning stuff on Youtube(mostly). )

This game will be about dungeon crawling/rpg type of game.

I will continue this demo in future ( well mostly sprites and assets job).

To Be Added ( maybe ) :

- More spells

- Sorcerer enemy types

- Crits, Poision attacks , bleeding 

-More Player types ( archer, wizard etc.)

-A decent story

- Boss fight

-NPCs

-Town

- Looting system ( if i learn about more of this topic,kinda hard for beginner.)

-Inventory system with custom weapons/armors ( same reason its hard)

-Stats

-Blocking projectiles ( It is already in game but im dumb and trying to figure out how to work , you can use it by using [X] button but does nothing)

-Showing enemy location 

-Map?

Would love to hear more things that i can add my game and improve it ( if its a bad idea don't worry atleast i will learn how to add it and make a useful thing  for another game maybe)

Game Version -> 0.1.0

Game With Godot Engine.
